name: adventureOS
description:
adventureOS - an old-school text adventure

Set off for adventure in this text-based, text-navigated world.

Text Adventure Verbs

GO, USE, GET/TAKE, LOOK/EXAMINE, INVENTORY, HELP/? for known exits

(there are many shortcuts to these such as "i" for Inventory or using the navigation letter such as "e" for east or "r" for the right door.)

Coded by Sikosis for Adventure Jam 2022

This wasn't my original idea, unfortunately, I got sick at the beginning of the game jam and could not make my epic game, so, in about a day, I wrote this great little adventure. I hope you enjoy it, I enjoyed making it.
